TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Title extends System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartNamedElement implements class System.IDisposable
Public Class Title Inherits ChartNamedElement Implements IDisposable
type Title = class inherit ChartNamedElement interface IDisposable

summary.span: 表示整个图表图像的标题。

span.span: Represents a title for the entire chart image.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类将封装的标题的所有功能控件。The class encapsulates all the functionality of a title for the control. 使用公开此类根的集合属性对象。This class is exposed using the collection property of the root object. 可以有任意数目的整个图表图像的标题。There can be any number of titles for an entire chart image. 标题将能够：Titles are able to: - 为停靠和对齐或自定义定位。Be docked and aligned or custom-positioned. - 显示内部或外部绘制的图表区。Be displayed inside or outside the plotted chart areas. - 使用一个预定义如或。Use a predefined such as or . - 使用阴影、 渐变颜色和背景图像。Use hatching, gradient colors and background images. - 可调整大小和放置在图表图像内的任何位置。Be sized and positioned anywhere within the chart image.

summary.span: 获取或设置标题的背景色。

span.span: Gets or sets the background color of the title.

value.span: 一个 值，用于显示标题的背景色。

span.span: A value that represents the background color of the title.

value.span: 默认颜色为 。

span.span: The default color is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以将此属性设置为任何有效的 ARGB （alpha、 红色、 绿色、 蓝色） 值。You can set this property to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. 值将是如果您已经指定的背景的渐变颜色，则使用第一种颜色。The value will be the first color used if you have specified gradient colors for the background. Alpha 值控制一种颜色不的透明度。The alpha value controls the opacity of a color. 如果将此颜色设置为"透明"— 即，如果使用的 alpha 值为 0-没有颜色将分配给标题的背景。If you set this color to "transparent"—that is, if you use an alpha value of 0—no color will be assigned to the background of the title. 因此，在后台将是透明的。As a result, the background will be transparent.

summary.span: 获取或设置标题的背景渐变方向。

span.span: Gets or sets the orientation for the background gradient of a title.

summary.span: 还确定是否使用渐变。

span.span: Also determines whether a gradient is used.

value.span: 一个 枚举，表示标题的背景渐变的方向。

span.span: A enumeration that represents the orientation for the background gradient of a title.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来确定是否标题将显示渐变，并在使用一个确定的渐变的方向。Use the property to determine whether a title will display a gradient, and to determine the orientation of the gradient if one is used. 有关可用模式的列表，请参阅枚举。For a listing of available patterns, refer to the enumeration. 若要使用的渐变颜色：To use gradient colors: 设置标题背景中使用的基本色属性。Set the primary color of the title background with the property. 设置与标题背景的辅助颜色属性。Set the secondary color of the title background with the property. 将此项设置属性设置为所需的渐变样式。Set this property to the desired gradient style.

summary.span: 获取或设置标题的阴影类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the hatching style for the title.

value.span: 一个 枚举，指定标题的阴影样式。

span.span: A enumeration that specifies the hatching style for the title.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 枚举指定使用类型的画笔的阴影模式。The enumeration specifies the hatch pattern used by a brush of type . 阴影图案由纯色背景色和背景上绘制的线条组成。The hatch pattern consists of a solid background color and lines drawn over the background. 有关可用的阴影样式的列表，请参阅枚举。For a listing of available hatching styles, refer to the enumeration. **请注意**阴影线条的颜色由属性。**Note** The color of hatching lines is determined by the property.

summary.span: 获取或设置标题的背景图像。

span.span: Gets or sets the background image of the title.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示图像文件的 URL。

span.span: A value that represents the URL of an image file.

value.span: 默认值为一个空字符串。

span.span: The default is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性定义的背景图像路径标题，并且可以是绝对或相对 URL。This property defines a path to a background image for a title, and can be an absolute or relative URL. 若要定位的图像，请使用和属性。To position the image, use the and properties. 此外可以指定一个通过设置为"透明"的映像显示的颜色属性。You can also specify one of the colors displayed by the image as "transparent", by setting the property. 图像是.NET Framework，包括图标支持的任何有效图形文件。An image be any valid graphics file supported by .NET Framework, including icons. 背景图像优先于其他背景属性，例如渐变颜色。Background images take precedence over other background properties such as gradient color.

summary.span: 获取或设置标题背景图像的绘制模式。

span.span: Gets or sets the drawing mode for the background image of the title.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，指定该标题的背景图像的绘制模式。

span.span: A enumeration value that specifies the drawing mode for the background image of the title.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定如何显示该图像; 图像可以平铺，缩放，等等。The property determines how the image is displayed; the image can be tiled, scaled, and so forth. 如果缩放图像，它将拉伸以适应标题的边界内。If an image is scaled, it will be stretched to fit within the bounds of the title. 如果图像平铺，则从标题的左上角开始，对其重复绘制。If the image is tiled, it is repeatedly drawn, starting from the top-left corner of the title. 有关可用的换行模式的详细信息，请参阅枚举主题。For more information about the available wrapping modes, see the enumeration topic. 如果属性设置为，表示绘制图像的位置由属性设置。If the property is set to , the location where the image is drawn is determined by the property setting.

summary.span: 获取或设置标题背景的辅助颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets the secondary color of the title background.

value.span: 一个 值，该值用于带阴影或渐变填充的背景的辅助颜色。

span.span: A value used for the secondary color of a background with hatching or gradient fill.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这属性是确定的辅助背景色的多个相关属性之一对象，并在应用渐变颜色时使用。This property is one of several related properties that determine the secondary background color of objects, and is used when gradient colors are being applied. 可以设置为任何有效的 ARGB （alpha、 红色、 绿色、 蓝色） 值。You can set to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. 如果使用阴影，则属性确定标题的阴影线条的颜色。If hatching is used, the property determines the color of the hatching lines for the title. 若要使用的标题背景渐变色：To use gradient colors for the background of a title: - 设置与基本色属性。Set the primary color with the property. - 设置使用的辅助颜色属性。Set the secondary color with the property. - 设置属性设置为所需的渐变样式。Set the property to the desired gradient style.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性设置为`false`，标题停靠到外边缘绘制的图表区中; 如果此属性设置为`true`，标题将停靠到内部的图表区的边缘。If the property is set to `false`, the title is docked to the outside edge of the plotted chart areas; if this property is set to `true`, the title will be docked to the inside edge of the chart area. 如果此属性将具有无效的名称对象未分配给属性。This property will have no effect if the name of a object is not assigned to the property. **请注意**只适用于此行为属性设置为。**Note** This behavior only applies if the property is set to . 如果这不是这种情况，则将设置属性不起作用，因为标题的位置然后由属性值。If this is not the case, setting the property has no effect, because the position of the title is then determined by the property value.

summary.span: 获取或设置 对象的唯一名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the unique name of a object.

value.span: 一个 值，表示标题对象的唯一名称。

span.span: A value that represents the unique name of the title object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 标题对象的名称必须是唯一的;否则将引发异常。The name of a title object must be unique; otherwise an exception will be thrown. 此属性可以用作索引器，在检索时对象从对象。This property can be used as the indexer when you retrieve a object from the object. 如果此属性设置为零长度字符串，将引发异常。If this property is set to a zero-length string, an exception will be thrown.

span.span: An value that represents the position of the title.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性是自动的 (即 Title.Position.Auto = `true`) 来自动计算标题位置控件，并考虑，和属性设置。If the property is automatic (that is, Title.Position.Auto = `true`) the title position is calculated automatically by the control, taking into account the , and property settings. 如果不是自动的，并属性将被忽略，并由所返回的值仅确定标题位置对象。If it is not automatic, the , and properties are ignored, and the title position is solely determined by the value of the returned object.

span.span: Gets or sets the shadow color for the title.

value.span: 默认颜色为 。

span.span: The default color is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可以设置为任何有效的 ARGB （alpha、 红色、 绿色、 蓝色） 值。This property can be set to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. Alpha 值可用于实现"真实"隐藏效果;请尝试"128,0,0,0"阴影的颜色值。The alpha value can be used to achieve a "realistic" shadowing effect; try a color value of "128,0,0,0" for shadows. 若要实现阴影，设置属性设置为零 (0) 以外的值。To implement a shadow, set the property to a value other than zero (0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要实现阴影效果，将此属性设置为零 (0) 以外的值。To implement shadowing, set this property to a value other than zero (0). 正值将导致向下和向右; 移动阴影负值将导致一个向上和向左移动的阴影。A positive value will result in a shadow that shifts down and to the right; a negative value will result in a shadow that shifts up and to the left.

span.span: A enumeration value that determines the style of the text for the title.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有五个可能的样式标题文本： ， ， ， ，和。There are five possible styles for title text: , , , , and . 请参阅下表中的这些样式的摘要：Refer to the table below for a summary of these styles: |样式Style|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |默认Default|使用所需的字体和颜色，没有其他效果显示文本。Text is displayed using the desired font and color, with no additional effects.| |阴影Shadow|添加的阴影效果的文本中使用的所需的字体和颜色显示文本。Text is displayed using the desired font and color with an added shadow effect on the text.| |浮雕Emboss|文本使用所需的字体和颜色显示但绘制带有浮雕效果。Text is displayed using the desired font and color but drawn with an embossing effect.| |嵌入Embed|文本使用所需的字体和颜色显示但绘制具有嵌入效果。Text is displayed using the desired font and color but drawn with an embedding effect.| |FrameFrame|文本是使用所需的字体和颜色显示但没有填充的文本，也就是说，大纲形式绘制。Text is displayed using the desired font and color but drawn as an outline of the text, that is, with no fill.|
